Objects that have the same charge repel each other. A negatively charged object will push away another negatively charged object. A positively charged object
will push away another positively charged object. Have you ever had your hair stand up after taking off a hat? The strands of your hair were positively charged, so they repelled each other.
Objects that have opposite charges attract each other. The balloon that was rubbed with plastic wrap had a positive charge. It was attracted to the balloon that had a negative charge.
